title: Brandon Bays-The Journey for Kids
description:
This is one cool program to help heal kids, as well as the rest of us.  If you like this, enroll in BB's seminars and experisnce the real thing.

www.thejourney.com


from http://www.cygnus-books.co.uk/the-journey-for-kids-cd-brandon-bays-p14432.html  

The Journey For Kids (CD) offers a unique healing experience that will allow your child to feel more comfortable with their emotions and understand and accept their feelings; feelings which may previously have frightened them or held them back. The methods used have also been successful in healing a wide range of illnesses in children. Brandon Bays presents a simple guided exercise which teaches children to envision an adventure inside their own body. Here they can recall memories and, using imaginary balloons full of qualities such as courage, sense of humour, confidence or understanding, forgive anyone, including themselves, for hurtful situations they have experienced. This CD can be used to help any child from 5-12. 
2 CDs, 15 tracks, total running time 1 hr 33 min, 2004
